name: Airport Heli Parking
description:
Many Big Airplanes just landed on airport and some AirBuses ready to departure , Our friends just reached on city airport and waiting for pilot to get ready the helicopter by parking it on proper plane on airport.
This is another awesome new Ultra Helicopter parking 3D game . This newest free parking game in the series takes place on an airport! On this airport you need to find different ways to park your rescue helicopter. Helicopters, planes and smaller aircrafts or normal obstacles for drivers on an airport, but the great number of these obstacles can make it a labyrinth. Driving and parking the Helicopter is great fun.
Help us quickly.
